about_the_game:
The Firlyn Stones.

The Firlyn Stones is a Survival-Horror, adventure and a pursuit game.

The Story
You are a scientist, you are studying stars and meteors. But one day, you found a special meteor that crashed on the earth. You went looking for it but you only found fragments. So, to study more, you'll need to find more fragments.
But some bad people want the meteor to build a very dangerous weapon.

The Gameplay
You are in a giant world without human constructions, only nature is here. The Firlyn stones can be collected in this world. But watch out, guards will hunt you down. So be careful and especially at night. When the night comes out, the stones will begin to glow, so you can easily find them.

About This Game...
- You can play solo.
- You can play in multiplayer mode, where you can play with friends or people around the world.
- There's an experience system that when you level up, you can access more functionalities in the game (like character customization).
- The game is an oppressive game that will make you shudder.
- The game is an adventure game that will make you explore a giant world.
- There's some synthetic ambient sounds and noises that will bewitch you.
